title: Chat restricted over ONE game where I was being griefed. This is just ridiculous!
body:
Absolutely absurd, you play 100+ games, then have one game where you react to someone griefing you and instantly get chat restricted, lose honor, and lose chests and keys. Just so unfair and such a poorly designed system designed to coddle the sensitive SJWs that play this game.

Here is the logs:

Game 1
In-Game
Myfarlin: can u watch or ward my red
Myfarlin: hello
Myfarlin: am i getting griefed
Myfarlin: you got pings muted buddy?
Myfarlin: hardstuck been reading reddit say to mute all?
Myfarlin: there you go
Myfarlin: i int your lane now
Myfarlin: doesnt ward my buff, doesnt help, just afk in alne
Myfarlin: no map awareness
Myfarlin: please go afk bro
Myfarlin: we carry 4v5
Myfarlin: gl withyour climb this seaso nshen
Myfarlin: enjoy free win, not playing with full mute griefers like shen
Myfarlin: is everyone muted or just me
Myfarlin: i dont give a fk lol
Myfarlin: as you can see im getting griefed by my top laner
Myfarlin: hey guys i read on reddit to full mute all, it helps me with climb, im hardstuck silver 2 seasons Xd
Myfarlin: my jungler ask for ward, but it is more important that i sit under tower XD
Myfarlin: why are we not open btw
Post-Game
Myfarlin: this jungler just too good
Myfarlin: randomly walks up to red at 4 min
Myfarlin: on the 1% chacne that I do a full clear and my top is afk
Myfarlin: im inting your game if you full mute all
Myfarlin: quit being a cuck, if you dont respond to my pings im inting your lane lol
Myfarlin: if you cant ward my buff and sit under turret
Myfarlin: im inting you dumbfuck tard
Myfarlin: gl with your climb reddit %%%
Myfarlin: yeah he just grief me
Myfarlin: i can lose at 15 or 30
Myfarlin: no point wasting time

As you can see, it is very mild and simply a normal reaction to a troll who is looking for a reaction. I guess I shouldn't feed the troll so to speak, but he is LITERALLY GRIEFING MY GAME. I am stuck here with him and lose my game as a result of my griefing, and then I get punished to boot? Just so fucked up man.

I've been playing since season 3 and never been griefed. Oh sure, I've had people TRY to grief me. Try their hardest. But it doesn't case me any grief.

It's the mindset man. Don't let yourself be griefed.

For future reference: the context does not matter to Riot. If you respond to _anything_ with harassment/hate speech, even if what you're responding to is hate speech as well, you're breaking the rules.

But in case you're wondering, the c-word you used is considered sexual harassment and borders on hate speech since it's generally a gendered term. So in the future just respond by playing better or trying to be a leader. 

Make smart decisions about how you respond.

The f word is part of Riot's zero tolerance policy where they issue 14 day bans(or perma if previously 14 day'd). You said the f word in your chat which triggered the system.

Don't use hatespeech next time and you're fine for the most part
